item.title: Chevy Silverado EV smashes world record for longest drive on a single charge
item.description: General Motors claimed a new world record for EV driving on a single charge, after a Chevy Silverado EV traveled 1,059.2 miles without recharging its battery. The potentially record-breaking run took
